text:
Appearance: Dark red-brown, clear. Huge amount of creamy light tan head.
Aroma: Malt, slight caramel.
Taste: Medium malt, toasted, light caramel sweetness, butterscotch. Smooth. Lightly bitter aftertaste.
Bought: Trade with Grzesiek79 - thanks!, 700 ml
Info: 9/6-2017, BB: ??/??-????

On tap at Clock Block, Bratislava. 
Amberish beer with significant head. Aroma is nearly invisible. It has nice hoppy taste, bit bitter, malts are there too but not as high.
On tap at Clock-Block. High white head, caramel aroma, hazy amber colour. Bitter, yeast taste, longer hoppy finish.
Hazy amber colour, white head. Aroma of caramel, bread. Taste is light sweet, slightly bitter, very refreshing. Light body, nice slick texture, soft carbonation.

bottle @ friends/chef. Appearance: slightly hazy amber with massive off-white 
soapy head and lacing. aroma/taste: grain, bread, light caramel, floral and light herbal notes. palette: medium malty aroma, average carbonation, medium body, average sweetness, balanced by an average to notable bitterness, medium duration and a watery texture. Overall: nice and refreshing

Backlog. Synchronizing with notes and Untappd.
A bit buttery in aroma and taste.

bottle. Amber color with high white creamy head. Aroma: caramel, grassy hops, bread. Taste: caramel, roasted malt, hop, coffee. Medium body, moderate to lively carbonation. Decent bitterness. Balanced and drinkable.

750ml bottle. Slightly cloudy, brown-ish amber colour with average to huge, thick, creamy, mostly lasting, moderately lacing, off-white head. Yeasty doughy, slightly bready, malty aroma, an earthy touch of truffle, minimally waxy hoppy overtones. Taste is herbal hoppy, spicy malty, minimally grainy, bready, hints of brown bread, an earthy touch of truffle, minimally waxy hoppy overtones.

Bezowa i trwala spora piana, zabarwienie brazowo błotniste, dość ciemne jak na polciemne piwo. Smak slomy, trawy, kwaskowosci oraz tłuszczu roślinnego. Ciekawe wytrawne piwo, treściwe i goryczkowe. Super polotmavy lezak. Jeden z lepszych jakie miałem okazje testowac

Bottle. Deep amber with huge, white, semi-densed head. Light to medium carmel and butterscotch aromas, also lighlty honey notes. Taste is highly bitter, slightly balanced with malty character. Medium body, creamy testure, lively carbonation, finish is highly bitter. In general nice, bitter and quite refreshing beer.

750 ml bottle. Semidark brown colour with huge stable head off. Aroma of caramel, malts. Taste is semisweet with bitter aftertaste. You can notice here light notes of honey as well. Moderate carbonation.

On tap. This style (polotmavy) is not really favorite one in public, but this one is kind of different. Dark chestnut color, clear liquid, white head. Aroma of caramel, saaz hops, honey. Light sweet, light medium bitter. Drinkable, good.

Look: dark red, clear with white strong head.

Aroma: sweet caramel with yeasy spicy notes.
Taste: light sweetness, light spicy bitterness.
Flavour: caramel, grassy hops, yeasts, spicy ehters, some boiled fruits.
Surprisingly bitter aftertaste.

Not bad.

Čapované v Beer Time Nitra. Medená, nahnedlá farba, jemná biela pena, sladová aróma. Príjemná stredná rezkosť, slad, karamel, krásna horkosť v pozadí. Super!

---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Lukt: Malt, krydder og karamell.
Utseende: Brun.
Skum/kullsyre: Dekkende skum.
Smak: Malt, krydder og karamell.

Bottle 0,75l. Cloudy, amber colored. AROMA- fruit, fermented peaches, slightly sweet, malt, grain. FLAVOR- lightly sour, moderately bitter, fruit, touch of honey, woody hops. Medium bodied.Not bad.

#330Bottle 0,7. Deep amber hazy body, high beige head. Aroma of wood, grapefruits, earthy hops, hint of caramel. Taste is prominently bitter, slightly dry to semi-dry. Wood, leaves, floral hops and grapefruit. Medium body and carbonation. Pleasantly bitter polotmavý.

Aroma: fried bread, cereal. Appearance: amber, cloudy, rocky head,white foam, stays for a while . Taste: very bitter, light sweetness. Palate: medium body, creamy, soft carbonation, bitter, astringent, long finish.

Poured from a 750ml bottle into a dimple mug. 

Aroma - On the initial pour, lots of butterscotch. Thereafter, toffee/ wood/ vanilla comes into the fold. 

Appearance - Deep, copper/ bronze. Creamy off-white head. 

Taste - Burnt toffee, blond coffee, butterscotch, wood, faint fusel alcohol on the back of the palate. Resiny, almost harsh, hops bring up the rear and unfortunately detracts from the beers overall make up. Layered, malty flavors upfront are very enjoyable but the balance is sadly off. 

Palate - Medium bodied. Semi dry

Overall - Malt flavors impress but hops need some restraint. Good beer otherwise.

Draught @ Beergeek Bar, Prague. Pours golden with a offwhite head. Aroma of malt, caramel, light sourness, some herbal hops. Flavor is light sweet, caramel, little honey, herbs. a hint of butter. Medium body, average to lively carbonation. 220815
Tap at beergeek, prague. Copper color, white head. Sweet malts, caramel notes, honey. Sweet malts, rye bread, caramel.

bottle, pozdrav do Kralup! Slightly hazy amber colour with ab golden glow, mid-sized, creamy off-wite head. Lovely malty nose, hints of vanilla. Full-bodied, good, good malty base, almost chewable, delicious aromatic hops - perfectly balanced. Anytime again!
Draught at Nota Bene, Prague dec -14. Clear amber beer with an offwhite head. Malty caramell spicy citrus aroma. Malty caramel flavour.

Draught at Richtar Jakub. Amber color with white head. Butter in aroma. Flavor is estery. Low drinkability. 



---Rated via Beer Buddy for iPhone

Bottle @ Check This Tasting, Odense 2015. Pours Amber copper with a white head. Extreme toffee and butter in the nose. Soothing dripping Lurpak extra salty. Fucked! This brewery is fresh from tap out of this world. Waauw.. A disappointment!

Check this tasting, Odense 2015. Cloudy amber with a big off-white head. Aroma of malt and red apples, with a strong diacetyl note. Medium sweet malty flavour with diacetyl, but a background of some fine herbal and spicy hop character. This has to be a great beer fresh from tap and without the diacetyl
Bottled. Appeared dark-brown with some reddish body, proper thin foam. Nose is full of malts and a lot of caramel. Roasted malts, caramel, some chocolad with some bitterness. Not bad.
On tap at Richtar Jakub. Pours brown color, lightly beige head. Aroma of caramel, roasted malt, nuts. Taste is medium bitter, medium sweet, caramel, roasted malt, nuts. Bitter finish.

Draught at Nota Bene, Prague. Clear golden/copper beer with a nice lasting offwhite head. Malty spicy aroma, caramel, grassy notes, citrus, floral notes. Malty caramel flavor xaramel bit artificial, Saaz-hops, hay, a bit plastic.
Bottle. Aroma malty, grainy, bready, caramel. Clear amber to brown colour with a reddish hue. Stable yellowish head. Taste is also grainy, with a hint of astringency, earthy. Average.

Bottled bought from minipivovar.sk/fajry. Many thanks! Overall a good balanced semi dark lager. Dark amber, brown, a bit ruby color. Aroma of caramel, dark chocolate a bit plus some minor espresso. Taste a balance of dark chocolate, caramel and mild bitterness. Any time again!

Fľaa. Bledia jantárová farba, biela pena, dosť rýchlo opadla. Vôňa sladová, jemne kvasnicová a karamelová, troku chmeľovosti. V chuti výrazná sladovosť, troku karamel a v pozadí chmeľová dlhá dochuť. Stredne plné telo, niia nasýtenosť. Piteľne fajnové.
Bottle from fajry, many thanks. Amber color with huge off-white head. Caramel malt, yeast, light citrus in aroma Sweet caramel taste with bready malt, Saaz hops. Long hoppy bitter finish. Good.

big glass bottle, picked up at the beergeek shop. rich clear copper; aroma of old leather boots, quite tinny but with plenty of bitterness as to be expected with clock; some caramel, lightly grassy; not bad

Láhev 750 ml. Aroma je chmelové s jemným nádechem kvasnic. Pěna je bílá, jemná, středně vysoká a poměrně drící. Barva samotného piva je patinově měděná. Chuť má velmi výrazný chmelový komponent s jemným nádechem melounu a kvasnic, fini je středně hořký a drící. V ústech pivo působí plně, má střední říz a je dobře pitelné. Jedná se o opravdu chutné polotmavé pivo, výrazné chuti a příjemného aroma.

UPDATED: AUG 10, 2014 From 0,75l bottle. BBD: 31.8.2014 Pours nice clear amber liquid, medium to big frothy tan head. Aroma: malty, strong caramel, biscuit, light sweet, citrus, Taste: beautiful rich taste. light to medium sweet, medium to heavy bitter, light sour, malty, caramel, bread, cereals, nice bitter saaz hops taste, light yeast, Palate: medium to full body, creamy texture, lively carbonation, long bitter finish, very drinkable Overall: excellent amber pislner lager. very rich, very bitter, very drinkable. Perhaps even too bitter, less bitterness would make this excellent piece even more drinable.

0,75 l bottle 
bread, cereal, citrus, herbs, spruce, Dark amber - light brown color, clear, frothy, white foam, light sweetness, medium bitterness, medium body, oily feel, slick feel, average carbonation, long finish,
